data.message: Demonstrated accurate Pencil-to-code translation process: Success - Created V3HeroAccurate.tsx with exact values extracted via batch_get. Identified issues with my initial attempt (wrong padding, approximated values). Showed that snapshot_layout reveals computed positions. Process proven: extract exact values, don't approximate.
